description: Ms. codex. Fore edge title. Physical description: 20 lines per page; written in naskh in black on glazed, laid Arabic paper. Rubrication and catchwords. Occasional staining and a few repairs. Origin: Possibly 17th century. Incipit (leaf 6b, line 17): و اما الابواب فاربعة الباب الاول فى الطهارة وهي في اللغة النزاهة قال الله تعالى يا مريم ان الله اصطفيك و طهرك
author: Karkī, Muḥammad ibn Abī Ṭālib, active 16th century
abstract: A commentary on the Jaʻfarīyah fī aḥkām al-ṣalāh by al-Muḥaqqiq al-Thānī. The text is incomplete at the beginning and end, breaking off in the 4th faṣl of the 4th bāb.
extent: 191 leaves : paper ; 257 x 130 (190 x 76) mm bound to 257 x 134 mm
provenance: On leaf 1a, stamp of the Kitābkhānah-i Ṣābir Ardabīl.
dlme_provenance_en: On leaf 1a, stamp of the Kitābkhānah-i Ṣābir Ardabīl.
creator: Karkī, Muḥammad ibn Abī Ṭālib, active 16th century
كركي، محمد بن ابي طالب، active 16th century
dlme_creator_ara_latn: كركي، محمد بن ابي طالب، active 16th century
subject: Muḥaqqiq al-Thānī, ʻAlī ibn al-Ḥusayn, 1463 or 1464-1533 or 1534—Jaʻfarīyah fī aḥkām al-ṣalāh.
binding_note: Full brown leather with blind-stamped fillets; spine repaired with red leather.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
